Oh. I love this picture. When was the last time we had that kind of fun together? [gasps] Why, I can't remember! Has it been that long?! I guess I've been so busy running my shop! [gasps] Oh, no! Something, or should I say somepony, ''is'' slipping between the cracks! [sobs] I miss my Sweetie Belle! [sobs]
Huh? [bawls]

[continues bawling] And this is when we pretended we were storybook princesses. And here we pretended we were on a dangerous yet stylish safari. [sobs] So many wonderful memories! [sobs, blows nose, resumes sobbing] Not to put too fine a point on it, but... [bawls harder] Sweetie Belle loves playing dress-up. I miss her so much!
[through tears] I wish I... could, but... between... running... three stores and the spring-sition... I couldn't possibly...
B-B-But... but...
[sobs, calmer] Mm, point taken. [excitedly] I am going to visit my sister!
We can spend the whole day together! And we can do all her favorite things!
Oh, Sassy, thank you!
I'm going! I'm going! Hang on, sis! I'm coming!
[singsongy] Guess who's here to spend the whole day with her little sister?!
Mmmm!
[to Zipporwhill] Oh! Heh-heh. So sorry, dear. You're tiny. I didn't even see you there! Tend to get carried away with my entrances! Ta-da! [laughs]
I am here to spend the day with you! I'm so excited, I could practically faint! You don't happen to have a fainting couch in here, do you?
Oh, pfft, of course not. It's a treehouse! That would be ''très gauche''!
Oh.
"Client"? Oh, that is so adorable!
[sniffs] Ooh! You have mints to offer your "clients". [giggles] How.. professional. [giggles]
Oh, my! Look at this wall of satisfied customers! [gasps] You girls really have come a long way.
Come on, come on! You'll never guess what I have planned! [squeals][foals and Rarity giggling]
Ooh! So fun!
[giggles] It's just I know how much you love these puppet shows.
Oh, it's just like old times! You, me, greasy popcorn. It's like no time has passed at all.
Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! It's your favorite part![music and silly sound effects][foals and Rarity giggling]
Banana peels are so very, very slippery! [laughs] It's funny because it's true! [laughs]
What's the matter, darling?
What?! Since when?
Okay. We're here! Ta-da! [laughs, clears throat] Aren't you excited to be back here again? Do I know my baby sister, or do I know my baby sister?
Oh, pfft! Stop being so silly! You know this is your favorite ice cream shop!
And I convinced the original owner to come out of retirement to make you your all-time favorite dessert! [giggles, claps twice][tray drops]
Well, go ahead. I know you're dying to dig in.
Well?
[gasps] We can get another sundae! Chocolate with rainbow sprinkles, perhaps?
A salad? When did you get so practical?
[gasps] One more Filly Clown Surprise, please![thump]
I know you must be bored, darling. This is a very long line for one of Twisty Pop's balloons.
But just be patient. We'll get you your favorite balloon bouquet, and it'll all be worth it.
Well, I guess duty calls, and-and you, you have that now...
Oh nothing, nothing. Go on.
Sweetie Belle, hurry! He's making it!
[gasps] I know just what to do with this![fashion music]
And pose![camera clicks]
And pose![camera clicks]
Love the camera![camera clicks]
Hate the camera.[camera clicks]
Love it again![camera clicks]
Sweetie Belle, you did "hate the camera" for all these shots! [sighs] Let's do it again.
[gasps]
W-What do you mean, no?
Sweetie Belle, what is it? You've been acting weird all day. You used to love doing these things with me.
But it ''is'' you! You love puppet shows and dressing up and taking silly photos and tiny little clown-shaped ice creams!
[whimpering]

[sobbing] I can't believe Sweetie Belle talked to me like that. [indignant] And after everything I did to set up a whole day of doing ''her'' favorite things! I mean, accusing me of not knowing her?! I know her better than anypony! Um, thank you, Twisty, but the hard truth is, my sister is being unappreciative right now! And I'm going to go and give her a piece of my mind![balloon deflating]

Aha! There she is! [gasps] Oh, dear. Really should have changed. [huffs] No matter! I'm going to give her ''quite'' the talking to! ...Right after she's done with her conversation. Anger is no excuse for poor manners, after all.
I know so!
Oh, Sweetie Belle. I heard what you said, and you are ''so'' right.

Yes, but about us, too. The truth is, I know you're not a little filly anymore. But it's just... the last time we did all of those things together, I... I didn't realize it was gonna be the ''last'' last time. I loved doing those things with you. It's hard for me to let that go.
Sweetie Belle, I'm so very proud of the pony you've grown into.
I, uh, have a little bit of time before I have to head back to Canterlot. Could we spend it together? What would a grown pony like you want to do?
and
Heh, I didn't realize your idea would be such a delicious one! [giggles] I don't know how I'm going to finish this.
[giggles]
[groaning]
The poor thing looks so sad! Just what are we doing to do?
Uh, how can I say this tactfully...? You've lost your sparkle, Rainbow Dash.
Whatever did you do that for?!
[starts crying] I can't bear to see Fluttershy cry!
[crying hysterically]
And I'll design him a very special suit just for the occasion, whichever one it ends up being.
Goodbye, Tank.
No, no, no, oh! Goodness no.

Just a moment, please! I'm 'in the zone', as it were. Oh, yes! Sparkle always does the trick, does it not? Why, Rarity, you are a talent. Now, um, how can I help yo— [yelp] Oh my stars, darling! Whatever happened to your coiffure?!
Out of ''my'' hair? What about ''your'' hair?!
No, no, uh-uh. Too green. Too yellow. Too poofy. Not poofy enough. Too frilly. Too... shiny. Now go on, my dear. You were telling me where you're from.
Huh?[crash]

''Canterlot''?! Oh, I am so envious! The glamour, the sophistication! I have always dreamed of living there! I can't wait to hear all about it! We are gonna be the best of friends, you and I... ''Emeralds''?! What ''was'' I thinking? Let me get you some rubies!
Huh?[ponies chattering quietly and nervously in the background]
She's ''gone''![ponies gasping]
Oh, thank you so much for helping me with these flyers, Spike. I'm so lucky you just happened to be walking past the boutique. [chuckles]
No. [chuckling] It's a call for submissions. Fashion contest I'm organizing. A showcase for aspiring young designers.
Thank you. I remember how difficult it was to break into the fashion industry when I was starting out. That's why the winner of the contest will get to debut their line in the Carousel Boutique!

I've also managed to get esteemed fashion critic Hoity Toity and iconic fashion photographer Photo Finish to come to Ponyville and judge the show. ''And''... [squealing] Wait until you hear who else will be a judge.
No! [chuckling] The third judge for the Carousel Boutique's ''Couture du Future'' Fashion Contest is none other than... Applejack!
...What?{{squarebrackets|[[My Little Pony theme song|theme song]]}}
You already said that, darling.
I admit, Applejack ''is'' an unorthodox choice. But that is precisely what makes her an inspired choice!
Hoity Toity has expertise in fabric and stitchwork. Photo Finish has an artistic eye for shapes and colors. But sometimes, we designers forget about practicality. That's where you come in.
Which tells me you're a pony who knows what she likes. Besides, a judge must be honest, and you're the most honest pony there is. Ask any pony – they'll tell you.
See? So what do you say?
I do understand your hesitation. But before you say no, sleep on it?
[squeals] I just knew you'd come around!
[gasps] It's wonderful to see you! Mwah! Mwah! Mwah!
Thank you both so much for doing this. Mwah! Mwah! Mwah!
Miss Pommel is showing? I thought she was still making costumes.
Oh, my, they're absolutely stunning!
Oh, uh, this is Applejack. Another one of the judges.
[nervous chuckling] So funny... Ahem.

Oh, don't worry about it, darling. Uh, it happens all the time. Besides, that dress ''did'' look a bit like a disco ball. Although, Miss Pommel is making the point that, no matter what we wear, it is a costume of some kind or another.
And... that's okay. Let's go meet the designers and help them get ready for the show!
Designers, welcome! Today you will work on your designs, and we judges will offer our guidance and advice as you prepare for tomorrow's big show.
Lily Lace, tell us about your inspiration.
Next up, meet Starstreak.
Applejack, you've been rather quiet. What do you think?
Ah, well, that's why you're here. Fashion needs a healthy dose of practicality now and then.[hammering][rip]
Okay, yes, not a very practical choice. Fashionable, but not practical.
But of course, no look is complete without mane and makeup!
You know what? Uh, I think we've given the designers enough guidance for today. Let's, uh, let them finish their work.
[chuckling nervously, sighs][acoustic guitar chord]
Yes, of course... Some of her thoughts are tough to swallow, but hopefully her candor will help the designers achieve the best designs possible.
Sure... Hmm.[hard rock solo]
[sighs] Much better.
[inhale, exhale] I can meet my goals. Today is a fresh start. Good morning, everypony! Time for final adjustments before the show!
Is everything okay?
Ooh! Both good choices.
You don't mean that!
No! Please! Come back!
[sobbing]
''Stop everything!'' There is no show! Take it all down!
No! It is the opposite of okay! The judges have quit! The designers have dropped out! The show is cancelled! All my good intentions squashed! [sobbing] And it's all Applejack's fault!
Of course! But you said fashion is ridiculous!
Oh—! [scoffs] Come with me![knock, knock!][door opens]
Hello, Strawberry Sunrise. This is Applejack. I was wondering if you could tell her how you feel about apples.
Applejack, why are you so angry? It's just Strawberry's honest opinion. What's wrong with that?
Mm-hmm. Doesn't feel so good, does it?
I appreciate that, Applejack. That means a lot. I just wish you'd realized it before you ruined the fashion show.
B-B-But how?! They were all leaving. This was all coming down.
Ohhhhh! Thank you, Applejack.
First up, Lily Lace![camera clicking]
Starstreak![camera clicking]
Inky Rose![camera clicking]
And now, it's time to vote. I am drawn to the beauty and drama of fashion, and nopony does drama better than Lily Lace, so I vote for her.
Well, it all comes down to you, Applejack.
Well, Applejack?
Lily Lace's clothes go here, Inky Rose's will go there, and Starstreak's there.
And I agree. I told you your perspective would be beneficial.
Oh, that? No! I totally messed that one up! It's ghastly! Horrid! Absolutely terrible!
Pffft!
and
When you're right, you're right!
Ooh, I'm going to start with a facial, and then get my hooves done, and—
Isn't it called "Manehattan Escapes" because it's a deluxe spa where you can escape all of your troubles?
[sighs]
Yes, yes, woo-hoo. [clears throat] But just so we know, exactly how long will we be locked in here?
Ooh! Plum or boysenberry?
Yes, but one's a lovely purple and one's... well, icky.
Almost there.
We certainly had a good time, but I ''really'' was looking forward to a spa day, and the Ponyville spa's still open. Anyone?
[gasps] Something just dreadful must have happened to Applejack to make her not return!
Oh, Applejack, thank heavens!
Yes, why are you here?[toilet flushes]
And you are?
Well, uh, you made working on a cherry orchard sound... so delightful.
And how did you meet Miss Jubilee?
Is it because you were insulted when I insulted your hair?
Yes. Desperate times do call for desperate measures.
That was rude!
What? Pinkie– [screams][crunch]
[coughs][railway crossing bells]
When I get back, you're gonna get it, Rainbow Dash! [grumbles]
Well, that goes without saying, darling. After all, Rainbow Dash is the guest of honor at the Rainbow Festival.[whoosh!]
How dare you! I brought the itsy-est valise!
Did somepony mention something about a spa in... where is it we're going again?
Oh, I accept that challenge. I have so many whims.
An award for what, exactly?
I can't see ''anything!'' Oh.
[panicked] And we're headed right for it!
''I don't think that working!''
We've arrived, and there's nopony here to greet us?
Uh, yes, please. Could you direct us to the Hope Hollow Luxury Resort?
and
''The'' room?
[gasping dramatically] How rustic and charming.
Other than that she just called this place "the Royal Suite"?
Probably from all the dust up here. [blows, coughs]
But definitely in the top three... or would that be the ''bottom'' three?[ponies murmuring]
No. I think they're staring because we're the only part of this town that isn't... gray.
Look around. All the colors here are ''gone!''
And the way they're gawking at us, it appears they think ''we're'' the odd ones.
At the "Luxury Hotel".
Ah! Ugh.
''None'' of these things are as pictured in your brochure.
We should just leave this very moment!
Hmmm, an overall stylistic look to unify the sentiment of the celebration. That's what this festival needs.
Yes, darling, yes, yes, but more complex, more thematic, something like— Ooh! something like that! ''Formidable!''
[humming] Hmm? That's one of ''my'' designs! Hello?
Uh, it's just "Rarity". Uh, and I-I couldn't help but notice that you've got—
Well, thank you—
Yes, about that. The— the hat, the— the boa, the scarf, the—
Very charming.
I do hope you don't mind my asking. But with all this talent, why don't you simply display your ''own'' work instead of adding to others?
Hmph, ''au contraire''. Take this shawl. Hoof-dyed, nicely woven, a piece of art by itself. Imagine if you could work in color.
Like a rainbow. How would you like to work with me as the official assistant designer of the Rainbow Festival?

Darling, if we have anything to do with it, not only will there be a festival, it will be the most stylish anypony in this town has ever seen! Now let's get started![magic sounds][music][doors opening]
You're all here! Wonderful! You can help us set up our cart. Kerfuffle's official Rainbow Festival accessories.
Well, of course not, silly. The town doesn't have any color, remember?
And look at my purple kerchief. Isn't it divine?
Something wonderful!
Over here, darlings! Just look what Kerfuffle has come up with!
Oh, not more karaoke, darling.
[shrieks] Please! You have to help us!
The castle isn't open for viewings today. The tapestries all need changing. Again.
I don't socialize with ''dragons''. I don't know anypony who would.
I don't know how you know my name, but I am far too busy to entertain some tourist's ridiculous fantasies.
What in Equestria was that?!
Oh, Opalescence. Can't you just picture it? ''Moi'', stepping out in a stunning new gown at the Grand Galloping Gala in Canterlot!
Why, yes! I did make it myself. Thank you so much for asking.
Oh, Opal, of course you can help me. Thank you.
What's that? You want to help me more? Oh, aren't you the sweetest thing?
Careful now. Don't move. This shouldn't take long at all.
Is there something I can help you with?
[gasps] Oh, no, no, no! You can't wear this... old thing. You need a glamorous new outfit for the Gala and I'll make it for you. No problem at all. It will be my pleasure!
Twilight Sparkle. I insist on making you a new dress.
Not another word! I won't take no for an answer.
Let me guess, Applejack. You don't want a new gown either.
You can't possibly be serious, Applejack! You absolutely must wear formal attire.
What if I just spruce up your... duds for you a little bit?
Deal!
Hmm... [gasp] Idea! I'll make you an outfit for the Gala too, Rainbow Dash.
I'll make one for you and you and all of you. Oh! And of course Pinkie and Fluttershy too. Oh, and when I'm done, we can hold our very own fashion show!
Oh, it'll be a little bit of work, but it will be a wonderful boost for my business. Plus, fun!
Then it's settled. We'll have a fashion show starring us!
Oh, Applejack. You make it sound as if it's going to be hard.{{#lstArt of the Dress|song}}
That's it. Keep them closed. Don't look. Okay, you can look now!

These are your new outfits. What do you think of your old duds now, Applejack? Pretty swanky, are they not? And Twilight! I made this dress for you and I designed each outfit theme to perfectly reflect each pony's unique personality. Oh, it took me forever to get the colors right on this one, Rainbow Dash, but I did it. Oh, and it turned out ''beautiful'', don't you think? And I know you are going to love yours, Fluttershy. It just sings spring! And Pinkie Pie, look! Pink! Your favorite! Aren't they all amazing?[pause]
But what's the matter? Don't you like them?

[sigh] That's okay. Not a problem. There's plenty more where that came from. They were only a first pass. You're my friends and I want you to be one hundred and ten percent satisfied. Not to worry, I'll redo them.
I want them to be better than just fine. I want you to think they're absolutely perfect.
Oh, it's no imposition. Really, I insist.
[strained laughter] What have I gotten myself into?
Fluttershy! Your new-new gown's ready. I completely revised it and I know you're going to love it. What do you think?
Oh, you're just saying that.
"Nice"?
If you don't like it, you should just tell me.
Like it or love it?
Which is it?
Well, just tell me what you really think.
Tell me.
Tell me!
Tell me, tell me, tell-me-tell-me-tell-me!
Oh, Opal. These are the ugliest dresses I've ever made.
Okay. I did exactly what each of you asked for. Now don't hold back. Let me know what you really think.
[sighs]
Well, I'm... happy that all of you are happy. I'm just relieved to finally be done.[door opens]
Hoity Toity? He's coming here? To see ''these'' dresses?
Oh. [gasp] There he is!
[deep breaths] Okay. Relax, Rarity. Your friends like their outfits and so will he. [squeals] What's wrong with the lights?! Oh, yes. That means the show's starting. Good.[music]
[to Opal] Oh! Hide me.

I'm never coming out! I can't show my face in Ponyville ever again! I used to be somepony. I used to be respected. I made dresses. Beautiful, beautiful dresses! But now everypony is laughing at me. I'm nothing but a laughing stock! [sobs]

[sobbing] Leave me alone! I vant to be alone! I want to wallow in... whatever it is that ponies are supposed to wallow in! Do ponies wallow in pity? Oh, listen to me, I don't even know what I'm supposed to wallow in! I'm so pathetic!

Exile... I guess technically I'd have to move away to live in exile. Where would I go? And what would I pack? Oh, it's going to take me forever to do all of that packing. What are you supposed to pack when you go to exile? Are you supposed to pack warm?
Huh? Opal?
Opal, how did you get up there? Hang on, you poor dear! Mama's coming![door opens]
[gasp] Rainbow Dash?! How dare you strand my poor Opal in a tree?
What is it? It's not... you... [gasp]
Like it? Like it?!
No, I don't like it.
I love it!
You ponies did an amazing job. It's exactly the way I imagined it.
Oh, I forgive you.
But my whole career is still ruined!
Oh, thank you. Thank you! Oh, thank you so much!
[gasp]

[strained laugh][music][credits]{{Transcripts}}[[arنسخ/كارثة الأزياء]][[esTranscripciones/Vestida Para el Éxito]][[plTranskrypty/Sukces spod igły]][[ptTranscrições/Feita para o Sucesso]][[ruСтенограммы/Рождённая для успеха]][[svTranskript/Lämpad för framgång]][[ko래리티의 패션쇼/대본]]{{Infobox Transcript}}
[tired throughout] Oh, my! Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't get my normal beauty sleep last night...
Me too!
So then, what could've given us all the same nightmare?
[simultaneously] Ugh, we know!
Oh, my! [gasps] This is simply divine! How avant garde![dress roaring]
Forget avant garde! I should have said ''en'' garde! [gasps]
[gasps] It was such a pretty little chiffon...! What kind of monster would do this?!
Then let's stop it!
Go! I should be able to handle things here. [gulps] I hope...!
Then you must let us help you stop it before that happens!
''Yoo-hoo''! Well?[squeaking][party horns]
What do you think? Am I the toast of the trench or what?
Nice is an understatement. I look ''fabulous''! Who says camouflage has to be drab?
[hushed] And 'formidable'.
You leave him alone, Rainbow Dash! Spike's style is unique. He doesn't have to look like other dragons.
My little Spikey-wikey is perfect the way he is.
Yes. You've got something those dreadfully fierce dragons can only dream of.
The cutest widdle chubby cheeks! Ooooo!
Oh, sweetie, you are turning the most delightful shade of red. It is most becoming.
Oh, isn't he adorable when he waddles off in anger?
Yoo-hoo!
Good morning!
An early start?
Darling, this time I really do have to agree with Rainbow Dash. I don't want those big, ugly, nasty dragons to hurt one little scale on your cutesy-wutesy head!
Oh, uh, quick, do something! Stop him before it's too late!
I suppose not.
Goodbye, Spikey-wikey!
[through her grin] We're following him, right?
Oh, pish-posh! This costume is fabulous, one of my finer creations.
We can't let little Spikey-wikey wrestle one of them! He'll get clobbered!
Rainbow Dash, I can't believe your silly plan actually worked. Ow.
and
Spikey-wikey is going to stay with these awful dragons? Forever?
[screams]
And you're ruining my fabulous costume!
Fighting's not really my thing, I'm more into fashion, ''but I'll rip you to pieces if you touch one scale on his cute little head!''[dragons laughing]
[squeaks]
The trick to finding a new friend is to render yourself radiant. First impressions count a great deal, you know.
Well, everypony deserves a second chance. Ooh! Now, I have a top-notch idea. I'm thinking pastel silk here and here with a crinoline underneath.
Oh, with the right outfit, you can do ''anything'', darling!
Three weeks.
Well then, how about a hat from the... [clears throat] ...clearance bin?[fabric ripping]
And you're sure this is where Pinkie told us to get the blackberries for her special coronation dessert?
[gags]
[gags, coughs] Ooh! Twilight, darling! You're just in time. Only one more pre-coronation stop. We're picking up the final touch for your ''apres-hors d'oevres'' gown...
What?! I haven't made one of those! You must tell me when they add these sorts of things!
Well, that's odd. They look open.[knock on door]
Oh. Well, this being a thread shop, I thought I might buy some?
You know designers. Don't like being interrupted when they're on a creative roll. With thread this exquisite, can you blame them?
It's the first shift in royal power in over a millenium. Of course everypony is a little jumpy. Change does that.
You did?! But why?!
You beastly beast! Don't you know how much this day means to Twilight?! And me?! I made her dress! Why wait until now for such a horrible plan?!
[groans][zap!][boom!][rumbling]
Go, Twilight! Get help!
I'm sorry, darlings, but I can't possibly go to Appleloosa. I promised to deliver a new design to Fancy Pants for his Monocle and Top Hat Appreciation Society soiree.
Well, I could. But you'll learn as you get older how important it is to keep your promises, especially when running a business.
What?! Oh, my dear, no! Appleloosa is far too long a train ride for young foals without accompaniment. You could end up in the wrong place entirely. Why don't you see if Rainbow Dash is free?
Now, Rainbow Dash, I don't think Fluttershy would have called us all here to talk about this if she thought it was funny. Everypony has things they like and things they don't.
Honestly, Rainbow Dash, if you are not willing to put forth the effort required to pull a prank that everypony can enjoy, you may as well not pull one at all.
I know you're excited about the Filly Guide Cookie Drive, but I still have to do a few finishing touches on your uniform.[beat]
Huh. [reading] "You asked for it."
Hmm. I assume this is Dash's idea of a prank, which can only mean she's rigged some kind of booby trap to your Filly Guide uniform up there.
We don't. If Dash thinks I'm going to fall for whatever she's got in mind, she's got another thing coming. There's more uniforms where that one came from![splat]
Rainbow Dash!
Are you honestly going to stand there and tell us you know nothing about all the pranking Rainbow Dash has been doing?
Uh, since you and Dash share such an, uh, affinity for pranking, we thought you might be able to get her to, um, uh... quit it!
You took the words right out of my mouth, Applejack. Isn't that right, Rainbow Dash?
Of course it's quiet. Ponies can't talk while they're eating those fabulous cookies, heh.
Of course. They're probably all in a cookie coma right now.
Oh, of course not. I think the girls have earned a little celebration for all of their hard work. And I have plenty of sewing machine cake left over. Unless anypony wants a cookie...?
Oh! There is certainly no call for that! There's plenty for everypony.
Oh, Rainbow Dash, if you want all of those cookies, you will have to buy them, just like everypony else.
Wh-wh-what... What's happening?
What are you saying?
That's lovely, darling, except for one thing... [droning] We've already eaten theeeeeeeeeemmmmm...
Just delighting in pranking the prankster.
Or if they'd even enjoy it?
What ''I'' would do...[crowd gasps]
...is pick flowers that accentuate my mane. It makes for a captivating color story when you present them to whomever they're intended.[boop][flowers rustling]
Oh, darling, I need a dozen lavender pieces for Photo Finish's shoot on the most beautiful manes in Equestria.[beat]
I know you're swamped, but it's for ''Vanity Mare''! She's going to take pictures of my mane, so color coordination is a must.
Have you a single big one? If the wind came from one direction, it would really intensify the effect.
Hmm. I do enjoy the windswept look, but other ponies might need to ''see'' it before they feel it.[switch clicks][door opens][ponies aah-ing]

My mane will be flowing over the chaise in the tableau I have in mind. But I was hoping to choose the color. Could you make one in a pale yellow? I need something across the color wheel from this. [giggles]
Pinkie? I need to put Photo Finish in a good mood, and nothing creates a better mood than your confecti— Ooh. Am I interrupting?
[deadpan] Congratulations.
[shrieks] Pinkie! I can't have Photo Finish shoot my mane like this! And this party string won't come off!
[low growl]
[shuddering sigh] It'll be fine, Pinkie. I'll find a way to clean this up before the shoot tomorrow. [whimper] Actually, you might consider doing the same.[stretching]
[gasps] That's it! We'll pay a visit to Zecora! She's a wonder with a cauldron. I'm sure she can mix up a fix for both of us.
I... think you may still have some baking to do.[eerie music]
I do wish Zecora lived in town. One shouldn't have to brave the darkest part of the forest for shampoo.
Well, uh... Hmm...I'm not sure that your style is quite right for this particular photo essay. Photo Finish travelled everywhere in her search for the most beautiful of manes.
Well, yaks don't have manes, per se, and I'm not sure their style is quite what she's looking for either.[splash]
Though at this moment, neither is mine.
I'm sure you're right.[beat]
Listen, spooky eyes! Why don't you take a picture?! It will last longer![creatures squeaking]
On second thought, don't. Getting my picture taken in this state is what I'm trying to avoid!
Are you ''certain'' that's safe?
You really should bake new ones.
Oh-ho, what a relief! I can't tell you how worried I was that my mane wouldn't be ready for the shoot. [laughs]
Oh! [scoffs] Tell me about it!
Well, I do enjoy a good yarn, but I'm not sure I could take anymore mane fright today.
[screams][clatter]
Uh-huh, hmm, yes, well, very entertaining. Uh, thanks for the shampoo. Ta-ta!

[humming] A relaxing shower really gives you the chance to focus on the fabulosity of your mane! [laughs, sniff sniff] Not the most pleasant scent, but it gets the job done. [humming] My mane feels lighter alrea— [screams]
It's important that you know that I am ''not'' pointing hooves, but—
Let's just say I understand why your shampoo hasn't made a splash in the marketplace.[cloak rustling]
Goodness, Zecora! You could at least pretend it isn't that bad!
Oh, thank goodness! I thought maybe your shampoo had triggered early-onset mare pattern baldness!
[laughing] Oh, what a relief! Well, if you could just whip up a cure, I'll be on my way. So much to do before the shoot tomorrow.
[mumbling] Sorry?
W-w-w-w-w-w-wait, there's, there's a chance?! You ''think''?!
[exhales] There's nothing to worry about. Zecora will have a cure before I've even finished my to-dos. But I don't know if I can even show my face looking like this!
Uh, sorry. I, uh, believe it was my turn, and I-I-I-I just need to pick up some—[flowers rustling]
Oh, so kind of you to say. I-I—
N-Non-fabulous?![customers agreeing][ponies muttering]
Oh, thank you, Davenport. Um, perhaps I can pick it up once everypony leav—
But— But— I— I—
[worried shriek]
I can't believe how differently ponies treat you when you can't command their attention.
"Messed up"? Does ''this'' look "messed up" to you?!
Honestly! How hard is it to pretend it's not so bad?
If today is any indication of how ponies will treat me from now on, I can't simply ''wait'' to see if my mane grows back!
Yes, well, even if everypony isn't utterly indifferent to my presence, Zecora might not be able to fix this in time for the shoot. Can't you do a spell to restore some semblance of my mane?!
Tricky! I know! I don't care! Make with the tricks!
This won't do! I need an ''actual'' mane!
More disastrous than this?![thump][magic zaps][flapping noise][scissors snipping]
[panicked stuttering] B-But Zecora said there was still a chance![door opens]
[sighs in relief] You mean I'll get my fabulous mane back in time for the shoot?
[groans, bawling]
I have always believed that the right outfit can make up for any other areas that are lacking. But I will need your honest opinions. [nervous ta-da] How awful is it?
Oh, ''come on!'' Can't anypony pretend it's not bad?!
Well, if any of ''you'' have an idea how to make this disaster look good enough for Photo Finish's piece in ''Vanity Mare'' on the most beautiful manes in Equestria, [sobbing] I'm open to hearing it!
Hm?[Bessie being milked]
I don't understand, Applejack. How is milking a cow going to help?
It's a good idea, Applejack, but Photo Finish is looking for the most beautiful ''manes'', not bonnets.[thip]
[gasps] You know, this is really quite fetching!
...Just not portable.
Oh, let's face it. I'll just have to call Photo Finish and cancel.
[muffled] Come in.[bell rings]
Would you mind closing the door? I'm more comfortable in the dark.[click]
[sighs] It's lovely of you to say, but it's hard to argue with cold, hard facts.
That without my mane, I simply can't shine as I once did, and ponies treat me like the sad, invisible pony I've become.
Goodness... You're right! The only pony behaving differently today was me! Besides, what doesn't shine from the outside in...
I'm preparing to shine from the inside out![guitar twang]
I have a solution![guitar twang]
Thank you. Although I'm afraid I missed my chance at ''Vanity Mare'', which means I have quite a few lavender arrangements to spare.
Mm... The windswept look is ''very'' last-season. Perhaps you could set this up outside. It's sure to draw in the hoof traffic.[fan blowing]
Photoshoot or no, you can always use a chaise!
Oh, pshaw, Applejack. I'm simply making up for all the time I wasted feeling sorry for myself.
I'm just glad I have all of you to remind me that even if I accidentally use magical remover potion on my mane, I can look good on the outside as long as I feel good on the inside.
[gasps] Pinkie!
If ''I'' had the remover potion this whole time, that means Pinkie must have the—[door opens][flooding noise]
...shampoo.
Uh, perhaps I'll fetch the rest of that remover potion.
So you're sure? You're sure it's fully recovered?
Oh, honestly, Pinkie? After all I went through, I'm not sure it even matters what mane graces the page—[whap]
But I... I cancelled the shoot.
I don't know what to say!
Eugh. [chewing]
[spits]
I... had a big lunch!
Breakfast. A big breakfast.
What was that all about?
[delighted squeal] Oh, what I wouldn't give to have somepony forever in my debt! I'd get them to organize my closets, and give me pedicures, and help me with my sewing and–
Applejack saved Spike's life and now he has to serve her forever.
[sarcastic] How ''ever'' did you come up with that ingeniously woven intricate plot line?
Mm-hmm.
[clears throat] We are all ready to play ''our'' parts, ahem, but are you sure you are ready to play ''yours'', Applejack?
Show us your best "damsel in distress" move.
Absolutely horrendous! Okay, this needs some serious work! Now, first, you must lift your foreleg up to your forehead, like so–
[screaming] Timberwolf! [sobbing] We are ''doomed''!
[to Applejack] See? Like that.[wood clacking][wood stomping]
Wait, you were ''actually'' stuck?
[cheering]
Oh! There are our little superstars! You were fabulous!
He put things right in time, though.
Oh, dear. Have you told him?
and
Hmph!
[sipping]
She's ''still'' at it.
, and
Mmm-mm.

Being a Wonderbolt was your dream!
Another visit to the Castle of the Two Sisters, I presume? We'd be more than happy to accompany you!
Sweet Celestia! Are you all seeing what I'm seeing?
Fluttershy, I cannot believe your spectacular voice isn't part of the Pony Tones quartet!
Especially since you're having us perform for your Ponyville Pet Center fundraiser tomorrow night!
This simply ''must'' be rectified. You ''must'' share that stunning voice at the event!
Pinkie Pie![thwack]

[sighs] Come, Fluttershy, you will join the group, making the Pony Tones quartet the Pony Tones ''quintet''!

Hundreds.
[gasps] Maybe even thousands!

''My hair''! Woop!
Hear, hear!
Not the dress! Not the dress![splashes]
Twilight, darling, are you all right?

When will the gift exchange occur?

[whispering] Which pony did you get?

I expected a package today, and I was wondering where that might be.
Uh, Rarity?

[low growl] Yes, it's ''for'' Applejack, but ''I'' will be delivering it.

Rarity. Uh, pleasure. I'm actually here about a package that was recently deliv—

Thank me?[clatter][tea pouring]
As an... acorn farmer?

[softly] Sorry, Applejack.[ponies shouting angrily][train whistle blows]
Well...
[grunting] A little help, please!
Whoa!
[sighs] At least Twilight has something to show for her effort. I ordered you a fabulous farm hat, Applejack. Alas, it decided it belonged to somepony else.
Uhhh, ooh... Something like that.[rip!]

[smooch]
[sighs][sewing machine whirring]
[humming][bell ringing]

What?

[gasps][paper ripping]
[inaudible reading]
[loud gasp]
''I got it!''
Oh, I have been holding out for the perfect location, and it finally became available! So now I can fulfill my dream of opening a boutique in ''Canterlot''!
I take it from your reaction that you like the boutique?

Well, despite my 'nubby scrubby buffy pony pedi, I actually have been working very hard! However, I never could have gotten the boutique ready for the grand opening without the help of my new manager Sassy Saddles!
I knew I needed a manager for Canterlot Carousel, so when Sassy showed me her resumé and I saw that she worked in all of the finest boutiques in Canterlot, I hired her right on the spot!
So I created a collection that beautifully revolves around the royal element of Canterlot!

[to Twilight] In every poll Sassy Saddles took, ''you'' were the most popular princess! Coincidentally, one of my gowns is inspired by the window in Canterlot Castle commemorating your coronation![curtains unfurling]
While I've always prided myself on paying attention to detail, I've taken my latest collection to a whole new level with "Rarity's Rules of TLC"!
TLC stands for 'Time, Love, and Couture'. And while I do agree that this dress has potential, I've not had enough ''time'' to give it enough ''love'' to become ''couture''.[door shuts]
But the rest of the gowns in tonight's line have met Rarity's Rules and are ready to be presented!
So, Twilight, we were wondering if perhaps you might possibly wear this tonight?
Ever since I was a little filly, all I've ever wanted was to own a boutique here in Canterlot. Somepony pinch me! I'm about to open the doors to that very boutique![door opens]
Oh, I don't think she meant to.
Yes, I am. Fluttershy, could you help Twilight get ready?

Fillies and gentlecolts! I am designer and couturier Rarity, I'd like to welcome you—again [laughs nervously]—to the grand opening of Canterlot Carousel, and I'm thrilled that you are here to see my newest collection inspired by this regal city![crowd oohs][camera clicking][BGM starts]
Fashion Plate of ''Cosmare'' magazine! I'm so honored that ''Cosmare'' was able to do a piece on the grand opening of my boutique!
Oh, uh, it's called "Rarity's Royal Regalia".

My favorite part of being a designer is finding my inspiration, and that really wasn't difficult when it came to Canterlot. Everywhere I looked, the royal city just spoke to me! I call it "In-''spire''-ation".[crowd oohs]
I spent hours by the lily pond on the castle grounds, which inspired this gown—"Water Filly"![crowd oohs]
Watching Celestia raise the sun each morning literally lit up my day... [beat] This is "Tripping the Light".[crowd oohs]
[giggles] And of course, Luna raising the moon guided me to sleep. I call this "Over the Moon"![crowd oohs]
And for our finale, I have something ''very'' special. I was inspired by the stained glass window created in honor of Princess Twilight... I call this "The Reign in Stain"!
—stained glass window of a reigning princess!
Yes!
But I rather like the—
[stammers] ''One hundred orders''?! All at one time?!
[clears throat] First of all, Sassy Saddles, I would have appreciated getting to name the final gown from ''my'' collection ''myself''.
[disgruntled laugh] While I see your point, we should have discussed it ''prior'' to the grand opening, Sassy.
[stammering] But... But receiving orders for one hundred dresses in one day, [stammering] it's just too much too soon!
Wha... But... [stammering] Uh, n-no, Sassy. Promises were made, and I shall sew my very best to provide each and every pony a Princess Dress full of TLC.
[sighs]

No, Sassy. These orders are my responsibility. All I have to do is stick to my plan so I can deliver each and every Princess Dress in keeping with my Rules of Rarity!{{#lstRules of Rarity|song}}[door opens][bell rings]
Is that the customer who ordered this Princess Dress?
Uh, actually, I'd love to see her reaction to this particular dress.
Well, it's just I made some really lovely changes to this dress—
Yes yes I know, but these gems just spoke to me, and—
Hello, and welcome to Canterlot Carousel! I am so pleased to present to you your—
Well as an artiste, I did take the liberty to change a few minor details.[beat]
I, eheh, I saw these gems glistening in the light, and they just spoke to me. Aren't they lovely? And so unique!
Uh, no. No, they're not.
Yes... Y-Yes, of course.{{#lstRules of Rarity|reprise1}}[sewing machine whirring]
[deadpan] Yes. Isn't it spectacular?
[reading] "Canterlot's newest rising star"?
[weakly] One... hundred more... Princess Dresses?! I'm the ''Cosmare'' cover pony... I have the most successful shop in Canterlot... I've gotten everything I ever wanted... but I'm miserable!
I don't ''want'' to make another hundred Princess Dresses!
What?! No!

''Stop!'' This is ''not'' your boutique! And if this is what success in Canterlot looks like, I want no part of it! Now, make up flyers for a going-out-of-business sale! ''I'm closing Canterlot Carousel!''
[to a dress] Oh, don't you look lovely? Nice to see you out here again. [to herself, hushed] Seems Sassy Saddles isn't rushing to open the door this time. Hm.[door opens]
Welcome to the going-out-of-business sale of Canterlot Carousel.[ponies chattering]
Oh, no, I'm sorry, the Princess Dress has been discontinued. But there are plenty of other lovely dresses on sale today.
Certainly. The dressing area is right back there.
And I'm sure you'll feel even brighter once you try it on!
Oh, yes, I do. It's-It's right here.
Hmmm. Perhaps you'd be even more taken with this one. It was inspired by the fountain in the Canterlot Castle garden. I call it the "Fountain of Truth"!
Oh! Well, then I'll finish it, and the gown shall be yours! [to herself] How can I have forgotten? ''This'' is what I've been dreaming about!{{#lstRules of Rarity|reprise2}}
Attention, everypony! Canterlot Carousel will ''not'' be closing![crowd cheering]
[giggles] Yes, yes, of course.
Well, so did the Princess Dress. The more I sold, the more each dress lost its time, love, and couture, becoming terrible, lackluster, and common.
I beg your pardon? The Rules of Rarity are ''only'' to be applied at Canterlot Carousel! Which is why you must continue to manage the boutique while I'm in Ponyville.
Well, yes, I'll come to Canterlot with new designs and to see the customers of course, but Ponyville was always going to be my home base.
I would expect nothing less.
and
I'm sure the festivities will be just lovely.
MMMM?
Although, you would look rather dapper in a tuxedo.
[gasp] What? Is it a crime to change one's style now and again? Why, I think it's a crime not to.
Fine, I'm guilty! [crying] I wear false eyelashes! Oh, and I took a bite of the cake.
You just made it sound so delectable.
I only meant to take a little, lady-like bite.
Terribly sorry.
Oh, this is horrible! [crying]
Yes, it is! Look at those drapes! I have no idea if they're tacky or not!
[crying] So do I![bird tweets]
And I'm afraid the windows are much too small for escape.
Let's hope they don't convert any of ''us'' first.
Even without my cutie mark, I can tell this is beautiful!
[grunting][whistling]
I think it's divine.
I find that nothing brightens my mood like a new ensemble!
[gasps]

So... we'd be allowed to teach however ''we'' want to?

—ever so sorry about the misunderstanding. All creatures are, of course, welcome.
[simultaneously] ''What?!''
We need to think like our students. If someone told us we would never see each other again, what would we do?
And I saw him in a shop buying pillows and blankets!

Well, how would you like to help create Ponyville's finest birds' nests?
Why yes. When the weather team guides the birds back north for the spring, they'll need a place to live and lay their eggs.
Oh why, thank you most sincerely. Would you like to try your hoof at a nest?

Okay. Now... uh, take some of that straw and hay over there, and a little bit of branch. Now, weave them through there, ''yes''. Uh, take some ribbon, ''yes'', oh uh, n... not there, oooh, yes, uh, tuck it in over there, uh but be careful not to... I don't know I guess that would do... oh dear.
Oh, Spa-ha-hike, it's not so bad, ah, maybe birds can use it as a...
''Spike''. It's just fine. It's just a little rough around the edges. Let me lend you a hoof. Let's just untie this ribbon, and let me take out these sticks here, we'll shave this... [mumbling]
Ah, and we need to weave the string...
[sob]
Simply ''the'' most important reason I've ever had in my entire life!

I've heard rumors that the Castle of the Two Sisters is filled with the most gorgeous of ancient tapestries in all of pony history! It pains me to think of those magnificent creations rotting away in those old ruins, totally unappreciated.
I require your help in ''borrowing'' one or two to bring back to the boutique where I can restore them. Maybe I'll even use the patterns as the inspiration for a new line!
Yes, well, [clears throat] maybe not ''the'' most important thing in my ''entire'' life, but retro-ancient classical will be all the rage next season, so it's nothing to sneeze at. [sneezes]
But, of course. Although, I must admit these ruins ''are'' a fright. Just look at all the dirt everywhere! Ugh...
Goodness! It's practically an artistic treasure trove of ancient good taste! [sigh]
[excited gasp] This one is ''perfect''!
Be a dear, fly up there and lift it off that hook?
[calling out] Maybe from below?[clattering and shuffling]
Oh, my dear, I am so sorry! That tapestry is far too heavy. We'll just have to find a smaller one.
Where, pray tell, did you disappear to?

I suppose these ruins are chock full of them.
Absolutely. We must use the utmost care as we—
[yelp][clunk]

[flatly] I can only imagine how that might feel. Hmm...
[gasp]
I felt something... alive!

I'm sure we'll find him.
[hysterical yelling]

I'm right behind you! Won't... [grunts] be... [grunts] a moment!
[yelps][spinning]

And there is nothing you can do to keep me from my sacred task of restoration!
[grunts] [grumbles] Of all the castles in Equestria, this is by ''far'' the most ungrateful![bonk]
Oof![lightning]
[all screaming]
Aah! Aaaah! I was only trying to restore ancient art! [muffled crying][lightning]
[crying]
She's with me...[magic release]
[gasps] Thank you.

I swear, this is going right back where I found it just as soon as I've returned it to its former glory.

What a splendid idea!

She's ''gone''!
Ugh, heavens no! Just look at it - it's dreadful.
[screams]
Take that, you ruffian!
''My hair''! [yell]
No. My eyes need a rest from all this icky muck. Well, I didn't mean that literally.
I didn't see you there, my apologies.
Why, of course it is. How ''can'' you be so insensitive? Oh, just look at him. Such lovely luminescent scales.
And your expertly coiffed mane.
Your fabulous manicure.
All ruined without your beautiful mustache.
I simply cannot let such a crime against fabulosity go uncorrected.
You look smashing.
Oh. It's fine, my dear. Short tails are in this season. Besides, it'll grow back.
Where did she go?
Look!
Oh, thank goodness.
I know! I'll never part with it again.
What? Ooh. So does yours.
Gosh, Cheese hardly seems the factory type. I just assumed he'd continue to wander Equestria throwing parties. Still, you must be excited to see him.
[giggles] I agree completely.
Did I ever tell you about the night that the mannequin came to life and haunted all the costumes?
I just told you, darling. A mannequin came to life and haunted all the costumes.
Fluttershy with us on Nightmare Night? Why, that's positively the most wonderful news I've heard in ages!
Mummy? No. Headless pony? No. Vampire fruit bat? Ugh, definitely no. You see, Fluttershy, the beauty of Nightmare Night is that you don't have to dress up as something scary.[smack]
Ooh! Yes. This one will look gorgeous on you. Period costumes are all the rage this year. What? No good?
Oh. I never... considered that. Never fear![smack]
[hums] Ooh, now this is a ''real'' stunner! I call it "Masquerade"! Just a simple black dress underneath but with this ornately decorated mask!
No?

Oh, Pinkie Pie, that all looks positively delectable. But you simply must try one of these cucumber sandwiches. Dig in!
Oh! I'm so sorry! I had no idea you had such distaste for cucumbers!
Well, hold on, because it gets even worse. Pinkie tried to lighten the mood with some fun maritime games.
Oh, darling, of course![lightning cracks]
Ahem. Er, Applejack? Just a thought, but maybe we should steer the ship toward calmer waters.
Perhaps if I took a quick look-see at that map of yours, I could find us a more cruise-friendly path—
[narrating] Clearly, Pinkie Pie had caught Applejack's sea madness.
[arguing][splash]
Oh, the boat sank. Obviously. [blows]
After all the effort I put in to provide her and Pinkie with the exact luxury cruise they needed to get out of their elements, ''that'' is how Applejack thanked me!
[sighs] Spike, darling, you'll have to forgive me. I am far too emotionally drained to discuss the matter any further!
Well! I can assure you that that is ''exactly'' what happened! But if you don't believe ''me'', you can ask Pinkie Pie. I'm quite certain her story will be the same.
Prepare yourselves for a luxury cruise! A day of opulence, decadence, and extravagance!
Oh, Pinkie Pie, those all look simply... well, simple. But they're obviously unfit for a luxury cruise. Now, my cucumber sandwiches, on the other hoof... Try one, then you'll understand.
Sorry! Cucumber sandwiches are ''so'' ten seconds ago.
[exaggerated posh laugh] ...Oh. You were serious. Well, that's adorable.
[grunting]
[grunting]
Oh, don't worry, dear. Luxury cruises never sink.
La-la-la! Prepare yourselves for the most luxurious boat outing that ever outed a boat!
Oh, darling, that food isn't fit for a pony of proper breeding, darling, and refinement, darling! Now my cucumber sandwiches, on the other hoof...
Pinkie, darling, please!
Well, I never! Hum-ph!
Oh, darling, whacking is a base pastime for common ponies. Doesn't interest me in the least.
Ooh! Why, this will make a perfect tablecloth for my cheeseboard!
[yelps][splash]
[panting] Opalescence delivered your message, Twilight! What's the emergency?
What's ''she'' doing here?!
An apology?!
What are ''you'' talking about? Applejack clearly caused the boat to sink! She stranded us in the middle of the ocean!
[gasps]
Well... Maybe it wasn't the ''middle'' of the ocean...
On that, at least, we agree.
Well, not that ''I'' have any doubts, but it will feel good for everypony to see exactly ''whose'' fault it was.
And why would you waste a perfectly good hors d'oeuvre?
With cucumber sandwiches?
So that's a...
All right. Even if our friend the bunyip is responsible for sinking the boat, it still doesn't excuse a certain pony's behavior!
And I was just trying to give the two of you the elegant cruise I thought you deserved.
Ohhhh.
That is so sweet. You must have gone through so much trouble.
Oh, let's never fight again!
Terribly sorry, darling. I'm afraid I'm... I'm not good with the thundery ones.
Whatever do you mean, Twilight? I'm simply doing what I've done since the day it first appeared. Does my sky look fabulous or what?[ponies complaining]
Too last season?
Why, you've become an Alicorn. I didn't even know that was possible.
And terribly far away.
In the middle of my friendship quilting class? I think not! All of those unfinished seams! [faints]
A glamour spell on our cutie marks?
I didn't see you there, my apologies.
I just wish Pinkie Pie were here so we could tell her how much we all appreciate her hard work.
We're not going to judge you, darling.
Stand still, Rainbow Dash.
''Do'' you want to look nice for Princess Celestia or not?
Mmhmm. Thank you, Twilight. Nice to know ''someone'' appreciates my talents.
Huh?
Me too. Oh, they're perfect.
[baby talk]
Not only are you adorable, but you're also quite useful.
Oh! Are you okay? Aaah! [gasp] ''Eewww''. Aaah! Gross gross ''gross''! No creature that behaves so revoltingly is allowed in my boutique!
[screams]
Ugh, Pinkie, I'm a little busy right now.
''Please'', Pinkie, I don't have time for some silly scavenger hunt. I've got a ''real'' problem.
[gasp] I see we're having the same problem.
Ew! If you ask me, it's already a total disaster.
[yelp]
Oh no... if they get inside my store... ''Everypony for herself''!
My outfits! Go on, shoo! Get out of here, you naughty! Naughty! [shrieks]
[shriek]
Well, at least he's not snoring fire. What are ''we'' meant to do about it?
Hmph. Talk about getting your ''beauty'' sleep.
[affirmations]
Ewww! Much better. Onward!
Good thing I brought my scarf.
I hear the only thing that sparkles more than a dragon's scales are the jewels they use to build their nests. Ooo, if I play my cards right, I might be able to convince him to part with a few!
Ugh. That's thirty-five games in a row. Best of seventy-one?
Almost there.
Eugh. Blech.
Uh! This is why a girl always packs ''extra'' accessories. Oh, ''please'' tell me I brought the tiara that goes with this.
[cry]
My apologies.

[coughs] Obviously, this situation just calls for a little "pony charm". Allow me, girls. I'm so sorry to interrupt. [clears throat] But I couldn't possibly head back home without mentioning what ''handsome scales'' you have. And those scales have to be hidden away in some ''silly'' cave for a hundred years?
Personally, ''I'' think you should skip the snoozing and be out ''there'', ''showing'' them off. Hmm. Obviously, I would be ''more'' than happy to keep an eye on your jewels while you're gone.
[cry]
I was ''this'' close to getting that diamond.
Oh, yeah... sure.[horn]
Darling, you look ridiculous.
Where is everypony?
It's what we always do, darling.
Post-apocalyptic donuts. Interesting choice.
We're breaking for tea and biscuits!
[gasps] [screaming]
How did you—

Darling, change is an integral part of fashion. I myself am considering opening boutiques for non-ponies. Things must evolve, or they become stale. For example... I was just struck with a sudden inspiration to change my design for your gown by including the webs of these star spiders. They glow for a short while after they're spun. They won't have much time to weave the sash, but the effect will be dazzling. You see, darling? Change can be fabulous if you embrace it![doors open]

Oh, you won't be traveling alone, darling. I'll have just enough time on the train to weave the star spider sash for your gown. But we should leave now. There's no time to dawdle if you want the coronation to be perfect.
I suppose it gave us something else to focus on.
Rattled to the core.
I just can't stop thinking about how much things are going to change!
I'd worked out exactly how much time I needed to weave my star spider sash, and now I'm behind!
''NO!'' She can't possibly be crowned without wearing her coronation gown!
You look amazing. Ooh! I almost forgot!
But now that we'll be living in different places, I'm not exactly sure how.
[screams, sighs, sighs again]
I'm going to call you "Repeatie Belle"! We've been through this! Please let me concentrate! [sighs]
You've more than earned them.
Oh, that's just awful.
You can count on us!
Oh! That was exquisite!
Hearing you all mention these experts, I am reminded that I too have the perfect pony to help capture the essence of your vision. To give it some style, some flair! [chuckles]

[chuckles] No! No. Um, I was referring to the premiere interior designer of the Canterlot elite – Dandy Grandeur. He helped me when I was setting up my Canterlot boutique. I know that he'd be thrilled to work with you.
Ooooh! Loving the print on those!
When a client has a vision... [chuckles]
I never would've invited Dandy to help if I thought he'd act in such a manner.
[simultaneously] That's the spirit!
They're different, that's all. Very... different.
Yes! These are some of my favorite materials. Very rare, imported from the Crystal Empire to match your northern sensibilities. I hope you'll find them—
...delicious.
Satisfactory, I'd say.
We have absolute confidence in your abilities, Pinkie Pie.
She's simply vanished!
I just wish Pinkie Pie were here so we could tell her how much we all appreciate her hard work.
I wonder if it's a filly or a colt?
Baby unicorns get strange magic surges that come and go.
''Moi?'' Babysit? N- Oh nonononononononono! I'm flattered that you would think about me though.
I must say, speaking strictly on aesthetics, there really doesn't need to be more to it. It's all simply divine!
[sighs] Very well.[beat]
Right. Let's get down there and find the spa.
It could certainly use a few more architectural flourishes. Or ''any'' architectural flourishes.
[gasps] What in the name of Equestria is ''that''?!
[gagging] Wha— Ooh, er, perhaps another time, good sir, thank you. [whispering] No wonder nopony's wearing anything!
Oh, please, Miss Pie! This is hardly the time for jokes! We've come all this way and for what?
We have differing opinions all the time, darling.
[laughs nervously] Well, w-we certainly didn't intend to cause any disruptions to your charming little—
My, my, my! What boasting!
Just because one has the ability to perform lots of magic does ''not'' make one better than the rest of us.
[raspberry] Just who does she think she is?
Enough. Enough, all of you. I take your hint, but Rarity is above such nonsense. Rainbow Dash and Applejack may behave like ruffians, but Rarity conducts herself with beauty and grace.

Oh, it. Is. On! You may think you're tough with all of your so-called powers, but there's more to magic than your brutish ways. A unicorn needs to be more than just muscle. A unicorn needs to have style.
A unicorn is not a unicorn without grace and beauty.
''Quick! I need a mirror! Get me a mirror!'' What did she do to my hair? I know she did something terrible to my hair!
Ugh, no. Green hair! Not green hair! [cries] Such an awful, awful color! [cries]
Hate you?
Why, whatever do you mean, darling?
''Most'' unpleasant.
Mm-hmm.
[gasps] Maud, darling! It's lovely to see you again! Oh! Congratulations on your rocktorate. What are you doing now?
Oh, y— Right. [laughs, clears throat] Well, if your trained eye happens to see a chartreuse gem, I'm desperate to find one.
Oh, you're an absolute darling! This will surely make my gown stand out at Countess Coloratura's album release party. Do you know how rare this is?
Huh?[rocks crumbling, gems falling out]
Why do you protest so? You've already given up wearing your crown all the time. The least you can do is embrace your new title.
You look amazing, darling. They've really captured your regality.
Oh, don't be so modest. It's everypony's dream to someday wear a crown and have their coronation ceremony preserved in stained glass for all to see. [sighs]

It doesn't feel right to us either, darling. If the Mayor wasn't so desperate for our assistance, we'd most certainly stay here in Canterlot. And of course we do understand that your royal duties must come first.
[general agreement]
Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye.
And you will be with us right after the Celebration. We already have an appointment on the books to discuss the royal upgrades to your loft decor.[train whistle blows]
[humming] Hmm. Something strange about the sky.[tea trickling][splash]
What in the name of calming chamomile is going on?!
Opalescence, darling, I'm so sorry! I promise I am not doing this on purpose![hiss][smashing crockery]
It wasn't me, I swear!
Ooh, Sweetie Belle! If this is some sort of prank you and your little Crusader friends are pulling, I find very little humor in it!
[gasps]
[yelps]
Something very strange is going on, and- [gasps] I for one would appreciate an explanation!
Alas, this whole raging forest situation seems to have left my horn on the fritz!
Oh, thank goodness!
[groans]
But perhaps you already know what's causing all of this calamity. Has Princess Celestia sent you to dispel it posthaste?
Hear, hear!
Sweetie Belle! I told you not to touch my things. Come back with my supplies!
Applejack! Were you reading a bedtime story to... an apple tree?
No fair, Applejack! You've got a luxurious, private sleeper car for a ''tree'', while I am crowded and cramped in the same car with all the other ponies. How am I supposed to get my beauty sleep?!
Hmph! You talk about it as if it's your baby or something.
It's widdle Rarity who's all "saddy-waddy"! Urgh!{{squarebrackets|[[My Little Pony theme song|theme song]]}}[indistinct conversations]
[sigh] For crying out loud in the morning![more indistinct conversations
Would you all be quiet... ''now?!''
I just ''love'' their accessories!
I want to speak to the manager!
They took Spike!
Ow! [groaning] Gently, please!
About the trees. Now if you could–
Hmm. Has anypony seen my decorative centerpieces? They were right here.
Would somepony kindly explain what is the meaning of all this water?!
One who doesn't ruin an entire class's friendship quilts. Do you know how hard it is to stitch a pineapple pattern?!
Yup. Rockhoof's time as a spa masseuse didn't work out either.
Oh, how horrid.
Ugh, what is that thing? Why is it so smelly?
It is called ''calligraphy'', darling. If you're going to make words, at least make them fabulous.[page unfolding]
[sniffs] Ahhh! Even better than a perfect copy.
Sounds fabulous.
[bawling]
[crying]
[crying]
Why, I'm creating a gown, darling!
I don't know! I'm stress-sewing! [frustrated noises]
When I overheard those two at the cafe, I suddenly understood why I've been getting cancellations for days!
Because nopony likes me any more! They're boycotting me! [grunts][ponies chattering]
Right away, pony-who-still-likes-me!
My emotions, darling! Stress couture!
Hmm? Oh, uh, sorry, darling. Force of habit.[curtain drawing][loud muffled chatter]
Absolutely. Fads come and go. Friendship is forever.
[grimly] I was wondering when all of you were going to show up.
[excitedly] Now we can all read the review together!
No, no, darling. Please, no spoilers.
''No spoilers!''{{squarebrackets|[[My Little Pony theme song|theme song]]}}
Now, is everypony ready to hear what I'm sure is a stellar review that describes in stunning detail exactly how each of you contributed to the successful opening of Rarity For You?[zip]

[clears throat, reading] "Many a pony has tried their hoof at joining the ranks of the elite fashion trendsetters currently ensconced in the boutiques of Manehattan's famed Saddle Row." [giggles, continues reading] "Some might say it's the ultimate achievement in Equestrian fashion, and never before has a reporter been granted such unfettered behind-the-scenes access until now!"
Oh, uh... [mutters] Ah! [reading] "I sat down with..." [giggles, continues reading] "...Rarity and her friends after the opening to get the inside scoop, and what a scoop it was!"
Well, I was wondering—

Well, I wouldn't say ''all'' over Equestria. I just have two other boutiques one in my hometown of Ponyville, and one in Canterlot. Uh, still, when I decided to open ''this'' one, I was nothing but confident.[bell dings]
Welcome to Saddle Row, an entire street lined with the most fashionable boutiques in all of Equestria!
I suppose it didn't make the cut. [gasps] Here it is! Rarity For You![door opens][shelf breaks][mouse squeaks]
No need to fret over a mere moderate amount of preparation. My clothes arrive soon, my sales associate after that, and with a little... dusting, we'll be ready for the grand opening tonight.
Mr. Stripes owns the building. He's a very pleasant landlord. Although he ''can'' be pushy at times. [beat] Okay, ''all'' the time.
[chuckles nervously] It's just, I'm dreadfully busy preparing for tonight's grand opening, as you can see.
I'm sorry. I just don't think it's going to be possible.
Oh, uh, welcome aboard.
Golly, what a splendid idea! [chuckles nervously]
Glow-in-the-dark teeth! What was she thinking?!
Aah! Fluttershy, your assistance is required in the stock room, posthaste!
But what are they doing here?[raccoons chittering]
No, no, no! I can't have a family of rubbish-scented raccoons living in my boutique![dance music playing, chandelier creaks]
Uh, did you hear that?
[annoyed] Heh. Turns out there's a Club Pony Party Palace upstairs.
I'm sorry. Could you please ask her to turn it down? Could you ask her to turn it down, please? [pleading] Turn it down, please! [sobbing] Oh, please!
Ugh! Foals today listen to their so-called "music" far too loud. I realize that makes me sound like an old mare. But this is business![sweeping][dance music playing, chandelier creaking]
Apparently, DJ Pon-3 has a residency at the Party Palace upstairs, but security won't let me speak to her.[honk!]
Aah! What in the name of Celestia was that?!
[sighs] We'll have to do something about that, after I think of a way to quiet down that music. And after I finish designing the window display![crash!]
Ahh! Wait, is this my merchandise shipment from Ponyville? It's completely disorganized! A—A—... [sighs]

Gesundheit! Oh, Miss Pommel! I'm so glad to see you! Now, as the sole sales associate at Rarity For You, I hate to add to your already overflowing plate of responsibilities, but it looks as though we have just a tad more to do before tonight than I thought.
Oh? Why not?
Feel better, my sweet. We'll manage without you... somehow. And we'll manage glowing teeth and car horns and disorganized clothes and dance music! Am I forgetting anything?[raccoons chittering]
[sobbing] What am I going to do?!
My dream is doomed! Doomed, I tell you! ''Doomed!''
I appreciate the offer, but this is Manehattan. To make it in the fashion scene here, everything has to be perfect. The perfect location! The perfect clothes! The perfect opening!
Postpone?! Darling, tonight is the last night of the fall season. If we don't open tonight, it won't be...
Yes. I know what needs to be done. I just need more of me! Oh, how I wish I could make copies of myself!
You'd do that? Fluttershy, you'll handle those... strong-smelling raccoons for me?
[clears throat]
This all sounds splendid, but I don't even have a single employee, and I'll need the best of the best.

Oh! This is it, my dears. If you can handle these problems, I'll focus on the designs for the front window display. We'll show Manehattan what Rarity For You is all about! Oh, what would I do without you?
Now for the perfect window display. Hmm.[dance music playing]
A window display is the first thing customers see, and if they like it, they'll walk inside and experience the glory that is my boutique.
How's it—[door slams]
Ooh!
Hello? The door appears to be stuck!
Hmm. Well, shouldn't let this time go to waste.[ponies chattering and raccoons chittering]
Perfect![doorknob rattling][door opens][thump]
[gasps] Oh! What's all this?
Oh! I knew I could count on you! All right... I suppose this is the moment of truth...[door opens, bell rings]
Rarity For You is now open![ponies chattering]
Oh, dear. I wasn't quite prepared for such a crowd. How will I handle them all?

[reading] "In the end, Rarity's grand opening was a smashing success! True, it got off to a rocky start, but somehow this rag-tag group of ne'er-do-wells..." [to ponies] Oh, heavens, I think he means you. [continues reading] "...came together and created the perfect boutique. A vision of Rarity combined with the expertise of her friends! This reporter, for one, is a believer." [to ponies] Why didn't you tell me there were so many problems?
[giggles] "Ne'er-do-wells" or not, I know I can always count on all of you. And nothing could be more perfect than that.
These fabrics all need to be dyed those colors. Do you think you can handle that?
You get started while Fluttershy and I head to the store for more supplies. Ta-ta!
Oh, darling, dyeing fabric is the ''simplest'' thing![door opens]
You just dip cloth in a bo—
[gasps]
Zephyr, I asked ''you'' to do this job! Not to pawn it off on innocent woodland creatures!
[frustrated stuttering] Zephyr, this is just ''unacceptable''!
Ugghh![door closes]
You leave Ponyville alone!
[tears up] I'm sorry. I'm trying to be strong, but I just can't bear to think about poor Sweetie Belle under the spell of that monster!
Normally, I wouldn't dream of digging, but right now, ''show me the muddy!''[digging][whirring]
Sweetie Belle, please stop! I can't get her to stop! I can't get her—!
Darling, that's oddly specific.[crackling]
For our families!
[shrieks] Oh, sorry about this, Fancy Pants!
But we can't just leave them here, all possessed and Sombra-fied!
For our families!
Ugh! So he could have ended the whole Sombra thing whenever he wanted?
[giggles] Life certainly hasn't been dull since we met.
Oh, your first Grand Galloping Gala! The excitement, the anticipation! I wouldn't miss this for all the jewels in Equestria!
Ahem! To answer your rather rude question, they're going as our dates, our plus-ones.
[muffled screaming] Let me in![thumping][lock clicks]
[gasps for breath] That creature took my jewels!
Oh, my shoes will be ruined forever!
Perfect! [doorbell ringing]
Coming! Welcome to Carousel Boutique, where every garment is chic, unique, and magnifique. [gasp] Sapphire Shores! The pony of pop!
You yah... y-y-you know my name?
Oh my stars. If I'm dreaming, do not wake me up. How may I help you, Miss Shores?
[giggle] How may I help you, Sapphire?
I have just what you need. Sapphire Shores, prepare yourself for the pièce de résistance de la haute couture. I used every last diamond I found on this one garment.
Really?
Beg pardon?
[faints]
Spike, a lady is never jealous.
Ladies do not "flip out", Spike. However, I was quite in awe. Oh, I need to find more jewels than ever before to decorate her costumes. Oh, aha!
Yes, Spike! Right there!
Spike! I promised I'd give you gems to snack on, but we need to collect more first or I'll never be able to make these outfits for Sapphire.
Come along, Spike. We have many jewels to find.
Spike![jackhammer sounds]
You've been very patient today, Spike, and for that you get the finest reward. This is from me to you. Is something wrong, Spike?
Ooo, bring the cart, Spike. There are more over here.
Spike! Where are you?
You know, it's terrible to keep a lady waiting.
I think we're really going to strike gold this time. So to speak. [laugh]

Well, Spike, I think that's all we can do for today. And these will certainly get me well on my way with Sapphire's outfits. Why don't we start headi... oh! What's this? Another jewel. Oh... oh, strange. It's in the trees. Oooo— ''eww''! Uh... uh... good day, gentle... uh, fellow. Uh, I am Rarity and this is my friend Spike.
And you are...

Oh really? Oh well, that explains your fine taste in jewelry. I mean I-I-I know that diamonds are a girl's best friend and now I know that they're a dog's best friend too, ha ha ha. So, um, [cough] you're out hunting for gems as well?
Uh... we?
[screams]
Spike! Come on! Hurry!
Waah! ''Spike''!
Unhand me this instant, you ruffians. Stop! Put me down, you thugs! You brutes!
Spike! Ah, dirt! [shrieks] ''Spike''!
''Save me''...!
Oh, woe is me! Whatever shall I do? Ah! Dirt, dirt! Get away, dirt! Oh! Make it stop, make it stop! Ah! Filthy, disgusting dirt. It stings, it burns. Help! Oh, somepony save me, ''save me''!
Ah!
Aah!
Aaaah!
[faints]
Oh please, Diamond Dogs. Please let me go.
But whatever do you want from me?
Oh! Is that all? There. A lovely pocket of jewels are right there. Now, if you'd be so kind as to show me the exit?
What? But you said you wanted me to ''find'' the gems.
Dig?
''Ohh...'' [grunting]
Forgive me, but prior to you so rudely dragging me into your dirt pit, I had a pony-pedi and I am not about to chip a hoof because you dislike my style of digging. [grunting]
I beg your pardon, but what, pray tell, are you doing?
Well, somebody certainly needs proper nail care. When was the last time you two had a manicure? You're scratching up my coat with those jagged things!
Good heavens, what ''is'' that smell?
Ah, mystery solved. It's your breath.

Well, since you insist... but I must say the working conditions in here are simply dreadful. Musty and damp, it's going to wreak havoc on my mane. And this air is stifling, suffocating. And when I try to take a deep breath, the stench of all you dogs makes me nauseated.[crash]

You look and smell like you haven't bathed in weeks. Have you never heard of soap? You could all do with a good round of soap and water. Oh water, oh water, I'm terribly thirsty. Could I please have some water?
And that's another thing. I would appreciate if you stopped calling me "pony". I am a ''lady'' and I wish to be addressed as such. So you may call me "Miss" or "Rarity" or "Miss Rarity".

Whining? I am ''not'' whining. I am complaining. Do you want to hear whining? ''Thiiis iiis whiiining''! Oooh, this harness is too ''tiiight''! It's going to ''chafe''. Can't you ''loosen'' it? Oooh, it hurts and it's ''sooo ruuusty''! Why didn't you clean it first? It's gonna leave a ''staaain''! And the wagon's getting ''heeeavy'', why do I ''have to pull it''?!
''But I thought you wanted whiiining''!
[dreamily] Anything?
[sigh] This water is hardly sparkling. But I suppose it will have to do.
What are you doing? Hey, you spilled my drink. Oh! [whining] ''Not sooo tiiight''!
Did you just call me a... ''mule''?
Mules are ugly. Are you saying that I too am ugly? [cries]
''He called me ugly''!
An old ugly mule! And it's true! Just look at me. I used to be beautiful, but, but nooow...
You're just saying that!
I don't believe you! You never liked me! [wails]
[distant crying]
Why, yes. Hello, girls. You arrived just in time to assist me.
With those.
Just because I'm a lady doesn't mean I cannot handle myself in a sticky situation. I had them wrapped around my hoof the entire time.
Me? What did I teach you?

Not if you eat them all, Spike.[laughter][music][credits]{{Transcripts}}==Notes==* "piece de résistance de la haute couture" can be translated from [[wikipediaFrench language|French]] as "top breakthrough of high fashion".[[arنسخ/كلاب الماس]][[deTranskripte/Diamanten-Hunde]][[esTranscripciones/Como Perros y Ponis]][[plTranskrypty/Kucyki i psy]][[ptTranscrições/Os Cães-Diamante]][[ruСтенограммы/Искатели драгоценностей]]{{Split|[[Junior Speedsters Chant|Junior Speedsters Theme Song]]|for=Enterplay [[Merchandise#Trading cards|trading card]] series 3 #E5 [https//3.bp.blogspot.com/-5nBWjoQDDE4/VSwHIFtZS0I/AAAAAAAAVcs/1XyGoF9HbCc/s1600/5b.jpg back] identifies [[Songs|song]]}}{{Infobox Transcript}}
Fluttershy, you mustn't let them treat you that way.
You've got to stop being such a doormat.
A pushover, darling. You've got to stand up for yourself, promise us.
Watch and learn. Hold it right there, Mister small and handsome.
Oh, of course you. Nopony ever called you handsome before?

Oh, well, they should! How about flexing some of your muscles for me? [gasps] Oh, my heavens! Do you think a strong, handsome stallion such as yourself could give my friend the last asparagus?[bit clinking]
See, that's not so hard, is it?
Alright then! What else is on your list?
[giggles]
So, Fluttershy, do you feel like giving it a try?
It was a valiant effort, but you should refuse to give him your business and just walk away.
Oh, your attitude is ''so'' feisty, it's fabulous.
Well, they've certainly made a difference in the way you carry yourself. You truly are a whole new Fluttershy.
Old Rarity agrees.
Fluttershy! What ''are'' you doing?! That's no way to behave!
No, sweetie, he didn't. We saw the whole thing. We think that you've taken your assertiveness training a little too far.
What happened to ''nice'' Fluttershy? We want ''that'' Fluttershy back.
